title: Olgareva
author: Olgareva
content: Domain name report here is what nicenic.net just sent to LeGauloisThe domain "moneromixer.net" is legit and featured in worldwide media, the accuser have no legit proofs or something, or website is not static like his which got reported before also the accuser just copied reports from the ones which reported his domains.Proof: benzinga.com/pressreleases/23/02/ab31055898/moneromixer-net-introduces-popular-monero-mixer-to-increase-anonymityIt's an attempt to harm us without evidence or anything else. The one who accuses us is frustrated that his phishing sites have been blocked and is now trying to harm us without evidence. The one who accuses us has no evidence or any legit proof, it's just about harming our services.The scammer has taken the trouble to mention my domain in forums in the bad sense to give the impression that it is really a scam just to harm us and our domain.The one who reports us has also taken the trouble to create extra new email accounts and to report us erroneously.I ask you to unlock the domain "moneromixer.net" because there is no fraud or abuse on it.--Very simple here, right?https://web.archive.org/web/20230323094438/https://moneromixer.net/createmixer.phpOld source code:view-source:https://web.archive.org/web/20230224215146/https://moneromixer.net/It is also the same person for [ monero[banned mixer] ] monero-mixer.online monero-mixer-xmr-mixer.comSo nicenic.net restored the domain name Shocked.Here is a phishing scam that pretends to prove a legitimate domain Roll Eyes.Except the domain has never been featured on bitcointalk and no topic appears here.It is a Chinese who is behind all this and who speaks French ?.
